What's New

 

The Tri-Arc Community Development Corporation will be hosting “The Bergen County Music Festival, Saturday, August 19, 2017 from 3:30 to 9:30 pm, at Overpeck Park. (see below) This year’s festival will have a religious component to be titled “A Day of Healing” transitioning into a music segment of the Bergen County Music festival.
